title: After 70 years, Buffalo Soldier will finally be recognized
content:
Pedestrians cover up using whatever is handy, from purses to shawls to umbrellas, as they make their way down Michigan Avenue near Chicago Avenue on June 15, 2015.
In Chicago, several viaducts were flooded in the Brighton Park neighborhood. The viaduct at 4600 W. Division St. was not passable, according to the Chicago Fire Department.
